entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. ‘Delighted’ Trump Is Now Pro Bitcoin
entry.summary: “I’m not a fan of Trump’s,” Kennedy noted after the Trump trial verdict was announced, but said blockchain can defend Americans against “dystopian” AI.

entry.title: Trump Still Favored by Crypto Bettors to Win Election, Despite Guilty Verdict
entry.summary: People putting money on Trump's political future on Polymarket don't seem to think much has changed.

entry.title: TON Market Cap Plunges by Billions After Fixing Inflated Supply Data
entry.summary: The market capitalization of Toncoin (TON) dropped by billions of dollars after The Open Network updated its circulating supply data.

entry.title: Trump Meme Coins Plunge After He's Found Guilty on 34 Felony Charges
entry.summary: MAGA (TRUMP) and other tokens inspired by Donald Trump are down bad after the former U.S. president's "hush money" trial ended.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 127 - CELEB COINS CRASH!
entry.summary: NYSE to launch BTC options. CME has ‘no plans’ to offer SOL futures. Stablecoin market cap rises to 2 year high. Inflation below 3.3% ‘means BTC ATH’. Crypto market cap heading to $200T: Yat Siu. Gemini recovers $2.2bn for Earn users. PayPal stablecoin will offer ‘confidential transfers’. Mastercard launches Crypto Credential pilot on BTC. Layer Zero launches on SOL. L2s are cultural extensions of ETH: Vitalik. FTX’s Salame says he will share story. SEI announces 27m SEI airdrop. ASI merger complete, to launch June 13th.

entry.title: Bitcoin Enthusiasts Are ‘Not Psychopaths’, New Research Concludes
entry.summary: A forthcoming study of 500 Canadian Bitcoin investors found them to be financially literate and emotionally stable.

entry.title: Caitlyn Jenner Solana Meme Coin Crashes After Launching Ethereum Token to Support Trump
entry.summary: The new Caitlyn Jenner token on Ethereum takes a fee to support Donald Trump's presidential ambitions—but the Solana coin has plummeted.

entry.title: Dogecoin Superfan Elon Musk Says He ‘Never Discussed Crypto With Trump’
entry.summary: Amid the former president’s pivot to embrace cryptocurrency, the Tesla CEO denies a report that they’ve talked about crypto policy.

entry.title: ‘Final Fantasy’ Maker Square Enix Moves to Arbitrum for Ethereum Game NFTs
entry.summary: Square Enix is jumping to Ethereum layer-2 Arbitrum for the next NFT character mint for its Symbiogenesis blockchain game.

entry.title: Why Pay? Every Good Thing About OpenAI's GPT-4o Is Now Free
entry.summary: ChatGPT Plus and Free are now equally capable. Does it make any sense for you to keep a paid subscription?

entry.title: Bitcoin Startup Babylon Raises $70 Million to Bring BTC Staking to Ethereum and Solana
entry.summary: Babylon, a startup working to enable native Bitcoin staking on chains like Ethereum and Solana, just raised $70 million towards that goal.

entry.title: Do Kwon and Terraform Labs Settle With SEC Over LUNA, TerraUSD Fraud Charges
entry.summary: The startup behind the collapsed LUNA and TerraUSD coins is settling with the SEC over fraud charges, a court filing revealed Thursday.

entry.title: Bitcoin Meme Coins Surge as DOG's 85% Jump Calms Fears That 'Runes Are Dead'
entry.summary: As some Bitcoin-based meme coins glitter with gains, a dog-themed token pushes back on claims that Runes hype has faded.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Mobile Game Coming to Mythos Chain on Polkadot
entry.summary: NFL Rivals and Blankos Block Party creator Mythical Games is developing the Pudgy Penguins mobile game to launch in 2025.

entry.title: Chainlink and Circle Want to Help Institutions Use Stablecoins and DeFi
entry.summary: The partnership is aimed at "moving the industry forward and growing the adoption of tokenized assets," a Chainlink exec told Decrypt.

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Projects Still Favorite Target for Hackers, But Stolen Funds Down 28% in May: Immunefi
entry.summary: Investors have lost $473 million since the beginning of the year to hacks and frauds, a decrease of 20% from last year during the same period.

entry.title: Singapore Bank DBS Says It Isn't an Ethereum Whale
entry.summary: "In relation to the post, DBS does not have this position on our books," a bank spokesperson told Decrypt in an email.

entry.title: Block to the Future: DeLorean Making Car Reservations Tradeable On-Chain With MoonPay
entry.summary: DeLorean is taking another swing at blockchain tech, teaming with MoonPay’s Otherlife agency to launch a new marketplace later this year.

entry.title: El Salvador’s Latest Push to Encourage Bitcoin Adoption
entry.summary: El Salvador has courted Bitcoin firms and crypto-curious nations in recent weeks, as it renews its push for Bitcoin adoption.

entry.title: Ethereum ETFs: BlackRock Gets $10M Seed Investment and Grayscale Adds Coinbase Custody
entry.summary: Two of the largest fund managers updated their spot Ethereum ETF filings, bringing in $10 million in seed investment and named a custodian.

entry.title: Notcoin Jumps 35% as NOT Sets New All-Time High
entry.summary: The Notcoin frenzy has made NOT the 7th most traded asset on Binance, beating out Solana, Dogecoin, or XRP.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey Backed Bitcoin Miner OCEAN Opens El Salvador Hub
entry.summary: The mining pool, run by Bitcoin core dev Luke Dashjr, has based its new hub in the capital city of San Salvador.

entry.title: Crypto Industry Cheers as SEC Must Pay $1.8 Million for ‘Gross Abuse’ of Power
entry.summary: A judge has sanctioned the SEC for its failed case against DEBT Box—and made sure he gets the case if it returns to court.

entry.title: Com2uS Brings 'Walking Dead' and 'Summoner's War' Games to Oasys Network
entry.summary: The XPLA crypto gaming ecosystem has expanded onto the Oasys chain via the new Com2uS layer-2 network, along with two big franchise games.

entry.title: Ethereum ETFs Inch Closer Toward Launch as BlackRock Updates Filing
entry.summary: The new ETH-based investment vehicles could hit the market in June, one analyst suggests.

entry.title: Sam Altman Joins New Team to Steer Sam Altman's Company to Safety—How Will That Work?
entry.summary: Amid shifting principles and missteps, is OpenAI letting the fox guard the henhouse with its new AI safety group?

entry.title: This Bitcoin Cycle May Be The ‘Last Gasp’ For Altcoins, Analyst Predicts
entry.summary: Millennials getting rich with Bitcoin aren’t likely to gamble their fortunes on alts this time, argues Glassnode’s top expert.

entry.title: Celeb Crypto Handler Takes $380K for Fake Iggy Azalea Meme Coin
entry.summary: The promoter that launched Caitlyn Jenner’s Solana token teased an Iggy Azalea coin and took presale funds—but she says she's not involved.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 126 - MEMECOIN MADNESS!
entry.summary: BlackRock ETF flips Grayscale in size. BTC ETFs see 11 straight days of inflows. ZKasino gives 72hours for ETH withdrawals. ENS to migrate to L2. ADA drops out of top 10 coins. Salame sentenced to 7.5 years in jail. Riot Platforms attempts takeover of Bitfarms. Ripple donates $25m to Fairshake PAC. Pump(.)fun launches live streaming. Iggy Azelea MOTHER coin leads celeb tokens. Beeple Everyday features many coins. Runes bounce, DOG hits $560m. PEPE active wallets double during rally. Cristiano Ronaldo launches 4th NFT. Friend Tech announces club wars.

entry.title: The Next Friend.tech? Avalanche's Arena Sets Token Airdrop Plans
entry.summary: Previously known as Stars Arena, the app prepares to step up competition in the SocialFi space.

entry.title: Ethereum DN-404 Tokens Are a Sensation in Asia. Are They the West’s Next Big Trend?
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow sat down for a conversation with some of the biggest adopters involved in Ethereum’s newest trend: dividing NFTs.

entry.title: ‘Crypto Is Sexy’: Is Iggy Azalea for Real?
entry.summary: After Caitlyn Jenner’s meme coin, rapper Iggy Azalea dropped her own—and is feeling the love from Crypto Twitter. But does she really plan on sticking around?

entry.title: Mastercard’s ‘Crypto Credential’ Goes Live to Simplify Sending Bitcoin
entry.summary: The peer-to-peer service provides simple aliases to users in over a dozen countries—and may someday support NFTs.

entry.title: What Would Make Americans Buy More Bitcoin? Clearer Regulations, Survey Says
entry.summary: Almost half of U.S. voters said they expect to have crypto in their investment portfolios in the future.

entry.title: 'Crypto Unicorns' Reveals Airdrop Rewards Amid Move to Ethereum Layer-3 Xai
entry.summary: Amid its migration from Polygon to Xai, Ethereum game Crypto Unicorns plans play-to-airdrop rewards for players.

entry.title: Convicted FTX Exec Ryan Salame Says He'll Soon 'Share What Really Happened'
entry.summary: The freshly sentenced former FTX executive said in tweets that he’s been unfairly treated, but also claimed he's not a "victim."

entry.title: Buying Crypto Simplified with Mika
entry.summary: In the first part of our series turning crypto beginners into crypto pros, Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of purchasing cryptocurrency using crypto exchange Kraken.

entry.title: Solana Meme Factory Pump.Fun Adds Livestreaming Feature—What Could Go Wrong?
entry.summary: After Pump.fun devs sexualized and harmed themselves on livestreams for money, the protocol has added streaming as a feature.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 125 - ETH NEARS 4K
entry.summary: ETH leads rally on continued bullish ETF sentiment. Previous anti-crypto Trump comments highlighted. Wave of influencers and celebrities hacked, release coins. Phantom becomes no.1 finance app in the US. Argentina & El Salvador hold talks on BTC adoption. LINK to have large announcement on May 30th. PEPE, MOG, TURBO, TRUMP hit ATHs in ETH memes. MOG up 60%, mentioned in Beeple Everyday. Caitlyn Jenner hacker releases JENNER coin. Garga outlines future plans for BAYC. Friend Tech founder offers $200k to migrate off Base.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 124 - THE ETH ETF IS APPROVED!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs get approved 19b-4 forms. ETFs won’t trade until July or August: Galaxy. ETF means many coins not securities: Coinbase CLO. Coinbase relists XRP in US. SOL ETF coming: Scaramucci. US House passes vote to ban CBDC. Building a pro-crypto army in congress: Sen. Lummis. Polymarket backlash over if ETH ETF truly approved. Expect ETH ETFs to be 10-15% of BTC: Bloomberg. BTC ETFs see $1.75bn inflows over 9 days. BTC to $150k in 2024 is base case: Tom Lee. ETH co-founder moves $37m ETH to exchanges. Grayscale launches trusts for STX & NEAR. Coinbase loses against SEC on DOGE sweepstakes. ALGO ad attacks BTC, SOL, ETH. Phantom now no.2 finance App on Google Play.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 123 - ETHEREUM KEEPS GOING!
entry.summary: ETH soars, ETF S1 approvals expected in hours. US house greenlights FIT21 bill with broad support. Gensler says SEC already has rules for crypto. Hong Kong set to allow ETH staking for ETFs. ETH OI continues to soar. SOL mentioned as next ETF candidate on CNBC. SOL ETF will take years: Bloomberg. MetaMask plans BTC integration. Fed says only 7% of Americans own crypto. SBF heads to a new prison. Hong Kong orders WLD shutdown. TON added to Binance ahead of potential listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 122 - ETH ETF MOVES CLOSER!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs move closer to approval, drop staking. Blackrock ETF see biggest inflow in 6 weeks. Grayscale ETH discount narrows under 10%. BTC & ETH heading for ATH: StanChart. Banana zone squared coming for ETH: Raoul Pal. Trump accepts crypto donations including DOGE. Pelosi mulls support of crypto bill. Farcaster raises $150M, DEGEN up 20%. Coinbase to launch gold & oil futures trading. Uniswap ‘ready to fight’ against SEC. Vitalik proposes solutions to MEV problems. Phantom may soon support email sign-up. Jupiter announces initiative to tokenise RWAs.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 121 - ETHEREUM GOD CANDLES!
entry.summary: ETH ETF suddenly seems likely, flurry of amendments. ETH biggest daily gain ever, gains SOL market cap. ETF approval shifted due to political pressure. ETF approval may come as soon as tomorrow. Squeeze liquidates $230M of shorts. ETH OI hits record of $14B on exchanges. BTC nears ATH amid 6th straight day of ETF inflows. SOL flips ETH in Google search trends. House Democrats will not whip against crypto bills. Anti-crypto FDIC chair Gruenberg to step-down. Grayscale CEO steps down, ETHE discount narrows. Genesis settles for $2B with creditors. Binance to focus launchpad on higher float projects. SEI v2 launch coming next week.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Chikai
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we sit down with our good friend and one of the biggest supporters of the pod, Chikai Ohazama. Chikai is the co-founder of Keyhole which was acquired by Google and became Google Earth. He is one of the most caring art collectors in our space, as well as an extremely talented AI artist.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 120 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: SOL again leads majors, DEX volume dwarfs others. BTC whales buys $106M in 24hrs. ETH ETF decision on Thursday or Friday. 5 of 7 onchain indicators ‘point to bull-run’. ETH ETF may be rejected due to weak link to futures. AI coins in focus ahead of Nvidia earnings. Cobie inks new article on low float, high FDV coins. ETH foundation staff reveal links to EigenLayer. 12 L2 & L3s controlled by single multisig. Layer Zero pauses sybil rewards. Aevo to airdrop pre-launch tokens on platform. FTM to migrate one-to-one to Sonic S coin. UK judge rules Craig Wright is not Satoshi.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 119 - GOOD MORNING BULLS!
entry.summary: SOL leads majors higher again, BTC stable. ETFs see $257M inflow, volumes hit 2 month high. 414 holders of BlackRock ETF ‘blows away record’. SOL continues to be fastest blockage despite usage. Pump. fun exploited for $1.9M by ex-employee. LINK up 20% after partnership with top banks. Senate also repeals SEC crypto rule. US Senator uses laser eyes PFP. Tether mints another $1B USDT. Bitcoin production costs now $45K: JP Morgan. Pink Drainer retires after stealing $85m assets. PancakeSwap to reimburse fees on Uniswap. TON & Tether partnership on payment solution. Trabucco writes character defence of Ryan Salame.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 118 - ARE THE ETFS BACK?
entry.summary: Bitcoin has best day in 2 months after dovish CPI. ETFs see $300M inflow, highest in weeks. ETH continues to underperform ahead of ETF ruling. Millennium buys $2B of BTC ETF. CME group to launch BTC spot trading. Fed’s Kashkari compares BTC to beanie babies. Tate says he will buy $100M BTC. El Salvador now owns 5750 BTC. Binance creates ‘antidote’ to address poisoning. Tornado Cash developer appeals conviction. China busts $1.9B USDT banking racket. MEV bot operators charged with fraud by DoJ. Swiss to adopt global crypto tax rules. FTX repayments create ‘bullish overhang’ for crypto. SEI up 30% after proposing v2 upgrade.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 117 - BITCOIN GAINS ON CPI
entry.summary: BTC bounces driven by spot buying. US ETF sees $100M+ inflow for first time in weeks. State of Wisconsin buys $170M of BTC ETF. Vanguard appoints Bitcoin friendly CEO. Coinbase sees billions of BTC leave exchange. BTC to consolidate between $55-75K: Novogratz. SOL beats ETH TEV for first time ever. ETH may be labelled a security by SEC next week. AI & memes the only two positive sectors this week. Crypto hostility led by TradFi: Lubin. Tornado Cash developer guilty of money laundering. Circle shifts legal hope to US ahead of IPO. Cypher developer gambled $300K of customer funds.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 116 - ROARING KITTY RETURNS!
entry.summary: Crypto falls, stays in range ahead of CPI tomorrow. US ETFs see small net inflow led by Fidelity HK ETFs wipe 2 weeks of inflows in a single day. Bracebridge bought $363m of BTC ETFs. Coinbase has system wide outage. Poloniex hacker sends funds to Tornado Cash. Brazil biggest in LATAM for crypto trading. Biden removes China BTC miner near military base. CertiK patches $5m flaw in Aptos bridge. LayerZero sees 100k bot accounts self-report. DYDX CEO set to leave. Tate sells $500k BTC to buy GME.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Roger Dickerman
entry.summary: In this week’s episode, we sit down with our good friend and founder of the 24 Hours of Art, Roger Dickerman. We dive into Roger’s background in trading and fitness, his love of art, founding Artifex and 24 Hours of Art, the power of routines, and so much more.

entry.title: We Do A Little With Funghi
entry.summary:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with our good friend and co-founder of Shillr, Funghibull. Funghi is one of our favorite collectors, builders and overall people in the space.
We dive into Funghi’s background playing rugby, going to medical school in Scotland, 10 gram mushroom trips, finding punks, forming Shillr, and so much more.

entry.title: Mika Breaks Down Solana Congestion
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer Mika explains what happened during Solana's Q1 2024 network congestion through Kraken's Learn Center.

entry.title: Mika Explains the Bitcoin Halving
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer Mika explains the recent Bitcoin halving and how you can build your understanding through Kraken's Learn Center.

entry.title: My Neighbor Alice Season 1 Beta Goes Live
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator Orangie plays the new season of multiplayer builder-game My Neighbor Alice and tries out all its features.
